name: Be The Bee (V01)
description:
In this crazy little game you get to be the bee!

Your goal is to collect as much honey as possible before the timer runs out.
Watch out for Birds, fishes and prickly plants!

Please note that this version of the game only runs on a PC or Mac in the browser using a keyboard! Touch controls might be supported later..
Please click inside the window to get control over the game!
